item.description: This show is happening on Sunday the 25th of November at the House Of Blues in Bsoton. I just bought my ticket and if there are any decent bars in the area we can all meet up earlier than the open doors time and have some drinks before the show. I've seen Lamb Of God a bunch of times and they always put on a killer show. Definitely worth checking out! Carpooling is always an option for people who live in the same general area.
item.name: Lamb Of God, Hellyeah, Sylosis, In Flames
